peril.views.slick.helpers

Class MenuHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.views.slick.helpers.MenuHelper

  • public final class MenuHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class that holds all the Menus for the game. This ensures that only one Menu is visible at any given time.
    Since:
    2018-03-15
    Version:
    1.02.03
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy, Hannah_Miller
    See Also:
    Menu

      The Map of Menu's names to the Menus.

      The currently visible menu.

      • addPage

        private void addPage(int id,
                     int nextPage,
                     int previousPage,
                     Directory directory,
                     java.lang.String filename)
        Adds a page to the HelpMenu with the specified ID. The contents of the page will be retrieved from the text file specified.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the help page.
        nextPage - The id of the next help page in the chain.
        previousPage - The id of the previous help page in the chain.
        directory - The directory that contains all the games assets.
        filename - The name of the file containing all the help pages content.
